package.name: Candybars_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Candybars is a simple message view style without buddy icons and other unnecessary distractions. It comes in 25 different color variations.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=1385
